mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At SecuriTop, our mission is to provide top-quality security services and solutions that protect our clients' assets, people, and operations while providing peace of mind and adding value.

history.title: Our History
history.content: SecuriTop was founded in 2010 by Sajjad Khan as a small security consultancy in Berlin. Over the years, we've grown into a comprehensive security service provider with offices across Germany, serving clients from various industries.

ceo.title: Message from Our CEO
ceo.name: Sajjad Khan
ceo.message: At SecuriTop, we believe that security is not just about protection - it's about creating peace of mind that allows our clients to focus on what matters most to them. Since founding this company in 2010, our mission has been to deliver exceptional security services with integrity, innovation, and a genuine commitment to our clients' wellbeing. Our team of dedicated professionals works tirelessly to stay ahead of evolving security challenges and to provide solutions that truly make a difference. As we continue to grow, our commitment to excellence and personalized service remains unwavering.
ceo.vision: Together, we're building a safer future for businesses and communities across Germany.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.content: We act with honesty, transparency, and ethical standards in all our interactions.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.content: We strive for excellence in every aspect of our services, continuously improving our methods and solutions.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.content: We embrace new technologies and approaches to enhance security measures and solutions.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.content: We aim to be reliable and consistent in our services and support.

property.title: Property Protection
property.content: Our property protection services provide comprehensive security for your premises, buildings, and assets. We implement tailored security measures to ensure your property is safe from unauthorized access and security threats.

personal.title: Personal Protection
personal.content: Our personal protection services offer specialized security for individuals who require heightened security measures. Whether you need executive protection or personal bodyguards, our trained professionals ensure your safety.

fire.title: Fire Protection
fire.content: Our fire protection services include comprehensive fire safety measures, inspections, and emergency response planning to protect your property and personnel from fire-related incidents.

nightwatch.title: Night Watch Services
nightwatch.content: Our night watch services provide dedicated security personnel who monitor your premises during night hours, ensuring round-the-clock protection and immediate response to any security concerns.

events.title: Event Security
events.content: We provide professional security personnel for events, trade fairs, discotheques, and more. Our doorman services and crowd management ensure a safe and secure environment for your event attendees.

retail.title: Retail Investigations
retail.content: Our retail investigation services help prevent theft and ensure store security through specialized techniques including undercover operations, surveillance, and loss prevention strategies.

transport.title: Transport Services
transport.content: We offer secure transport services for valuable goods, documents, and assets, ensuring they reach their destination safely with professional security escorts and secure vehicles.

detective.title: Detective Agency Services
detective.content: Our professional detective services provide discreet and thorough investigations for private individuals and corporations, including background checks, surveillance, and evidence collection.

district.title: District Services
district.content: Our district services include regular security patrols and surveillance of designated areas, neighborhoods, and commercial districts, providing a visible security presence and rapid response.

technology.title: Security Technology
technology.content: We offer state-of-the-art security technology solutions including alarm systems, CCTV cameras, access control systems, and ongoing maintenance to ensure your security infrastructure remains effective.

asylum.title: Asylum Accommodation Protection
asylum.content: We provide specialized security services for asylum accommodations and facilities, ensuring a safe environment for residents while preventing conflicts and managing access control.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Privacy Policy for SecuriTop Security Services
privacy.subtitle: How we handle your personal information

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At SecuriTop, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we look after your personal data when you visit our website and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

dataCollected.title: Information We Collect
dataCollected.content: We may collect, use, store and transfer different kinds of personal data about you which we have grouped together as follows:
dataCollected.identity: Identity Data: includes first name, last name, username or similar identifier.
dataCollected.contact: Contact Data: includes billing address, delivery address, email address and telephone numbers.
dataCollected.technical: Technical Data: includes internet protocol (IP) address, your login data, browser type and version, time zone setting and location, browser plug-in types and versions, operating system and platform, and other technology on the devices you use to access this website.
dataCollected.usage: Usage Data: includes information about how you use our website, products and services.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal data in the following circumstances:
howWeUse.point1: To register you as a new customer.
howWeUse.point2: To process and deliver your order.
howWeUse.point3: To manage our relationship with you.
howWeUse.point4: To make suggestions and recommendations to you about services that may be of interest to you.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies to distinguish you from other users of our website. This helps us to provide you with a good experience when you browse our website and also allows us to improve our site.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used or accessed in an unauthorized way, altered or disclosed. In addition, we limit access to your personal data to those employees, agents, contractors and other third parties who have a business need to know.

yourRights.title: Your Legal Rights
yourRights.content: Under certain circumstances, you have rights under data protection laws in relation to your personal data, including the right to request access, correction, erasure, restriction, transfer, to object to processing, to portability of data and (where the lawful ground of processing is consent) to withdraw consent.
